attributes.action: CORONAVIRUS: Stop tube/train & flights from high risk countries to stop disaster
attributes.additional_details: More than 1000 passengers came from IRAN during last couple of weeks and as I am IRANIAN, I know this epidemic disease (Covid-19) already take overs all the country and there’s no disguising the fact that the Iranian government is dishonest and now a days they are exporting Corona virus to another countries.
attributes.background: “Stop tube/train & flights from high risk countries to stop COVID-19”
